posts.description:
The black snub-nosed monkey (Rhinopithecus bieti) is an endangered species endemic to China, where it is known to the locals as the black golden hair monkey (黑金丝猴). It is threatened by habitat loss but today thanks to the efforts of @nature_org the number of these monkeys is raising. New jobs have been created thanks to the creation on a National Park and now local people are on the front line in the conservation of this species.
This is an example of how is it possible to successfully involve people's that once threatened the wildlife.

The black snub-nosed monkey was almost completely unknown until the 1990s. The fact that no single zoo outside China has ever kept the black snub-nosed monkey in captivity has contributed to the enigmatic status of this species. The black snub-nosed monkey lives in one of the most extreme environments of any nonhuman primate. The highest recorded altitude of a group of this species is 4700 m. The black snub-nosed monkey lives in very large super-groups which are made up of single-male core families or harems.The monkey moves fast and far in a cohesive group and covers vast areas in search of lichens and other seasonally available food items.

I will post more pictures in the next days.
A big thanks also to @kingstontechnology for providing technical support.

Hong Kong: I've been there several times and I still dont get why people love it so much. But I admit that the Victoria Harbour has an amazing Skyline. Maybe the best in the world.
I take this opportunity to thank my technical partners: @raymasterscamerafilters one of the best brands if you need GND or ND filters and @kingstontechnology one of the best options for your SD card.

Have you been in Hong Kong? Did you like it?

#hongkong #asia #china #victoriapeak #koowlon #koowlong #sunset #sunrise #twilight #harbour #crowd #building #mtr #tbt #beautifulthings #beautifuldestinations #amazingplaces #raymasterscamerafilters

Whish I could go back to Australia one day. I took this picture several years ago while driving from Adelaide to Melbourne along the beautiful Great Ocean Road.

The beautiful landscape of Heqing halfway from Dali and Lijiang. In Heqing, once a year, it's possible to see about 20000 pear trees in full bloom. In this area most of the people belong to the Bai minority, one of the 56 in China.

#china #bai #heqing #dali #lijiang #pear #flower #yunnan #asia #spring #bbctravel #yahootravel #bestintravel #traveladdicted #etihadairways #beautifuldestinations #鹤庆 #丽江 #大理 #中国 #上海 #北京 #昆明 #云南 #四川 #花 #travel #Cina

DongChuan (东川), also known as the red land, is a beautiful place were you can find stunning landscapes all year round. Pollution and traffic jams are not a problem in this part of China.

#china #chinese #mandarin #yunnan #dongchuan #asia #丽江 #大理 #云南 #上海 #深圳 #北京 #西安 #厦门 #昆明 #成都 #东川 #四川 #woytravel #yunnantravel #ctrip #cctv #travel #中国 #italy

One of the finest views of all China: the Black Dragon Pool of Lijiang. 
A big thanks to @raymasterscamerafilters and their amazing filters. Really great quality.
Check the link in bio to find the latest news about China.

#yunnan #china #asia #bbctravel #beautifuldestinations #wanderlust_heart #insta_china #beautifulchina #chinatrips #chinagram #chinalove #chinadestinations #loves_china #travel #中国 #云南 #广东 #广州 #深圳 #上海 #北京 #丽江 #大理 #元阳 #lijiang

One of the most impressive place I've ever been to. Yuanyang Rice Terraces, in China, are the Hani ethnic minority's masterpiece of ingenuity. In unique shapes and sizes with thousands of years of history, they form a mosaic of colorful and breathtaking landscapes of natural beauty.
Known as a "land sculpture", the terraced fields have been officially acknowledged by UNESCO as a World Cultural and Natural Heritage Site. There are three popular scenic areas: Duoyishu, Bada, and Laohuzui.
In my trips I visited some rice terraces in different countries like Sapa in Vietnam but none of them are as nearly as spectacular as YuanYang. If you want to visit this UNESCO site but you don't feel like organizing the trip by yourself (traveling in China is not easy) than I suggest you contact @woytravel. They speak English and have a lot of experience. A big thank you also to @raymasterscamerafilters and their amazing filters. If you want to take great landscapes pictures than you should try them.

#yunnan #china #asia #bbctravel #beautifuldestinations #wanderlust_heart #insta_china #beautifulchina #chinatrips #chinagram #chinalove #chinadestinations #loves_china #travel #中国 #云南 #广东 #广州 #深圳 #上海 #北京 #丽江 #大理 #元阳 #yuanyang #sapa #duoyishu #bada #laohuzui

My favourite place in Taipei is the top of this hill where you can see the whole city and the iconic Taipei 101.
The Taipei 101 was officially classified as the world's tallest building in 2004, and remained such until the completion of Burj Khalifa in Dubai in 2009.
